attributes.action: appoint Sir David Attenborough head of the Department for Environment, Food and Rural Affairs.  Save our planet.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As you may be aware, the Naturalist Sir David Attenborough has recently highlighted the danger climate change poses to our the beautiful biodiversity, ecology and future sustainibility of our planet. 

As part of a larger plan to incorporate ACTUAL scientists into the government (rather than pseudo scientists who just do what the government tell them)we submit the following proposal.

1. The immediate increase of allocated funding for environmental issues. It is further suggested that additional funds for this proposal could be gained from taxing some of the evil multi national who poison our planet on a daily basis. See Chevron, Coca Cola and Ford for good examples.

2. Sir David attenborough to be appointed head of DEFRA with immediate effect.

We need to protect our future and that of our children before it is too late...

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
